query: Forecast China lead demand from 2025 to 2035 using the baseline scenario
expected_behavior: Successfully loads China vehicle data from data/ directory
Runs forecast.py with correct parameters (--region China --scenario baseline)
Generates CSV output file with filename pattern: lead_demand_forecast_China_baseline.csv
Output CSV contains 60+ columns including total_lead_demand_kt, battery_demand_kt, sli_demand_kt
Shows realistic demand values (China total demand typically 1500-3000 kt range)
Output includes all years from 2025 to 2035 (11 rows minimum)
Creates output in output/ directory within the skill folder
No errors or warnings about missing data files
Validation variance columns (*_variance_pct) are populated where validation data exists
